text: Men gumaziba bar, kar men otarir iakɨnir vamɨra itibar ikegha ghua gumazir ghuribar tuzɨba, men dɨbobonim, 8,300ɨn tu.3:28 Hibrun akam ghaze, 8,600plan gumaziba. Ezɨ fomɨra gumazir maba akar kam Grighɨn akamɨn a gɨra, egha me 8,300plan gumaziba osiri. Ezɨ ves 39 kamaghɨn mɨgei, gumazibar dɨbobonim 22,000ɨn tu. Kamaghɨn ami, dɨbobonir kam, 8,300, a dera. E 8,600 kagh anetɨgham, eghtɨ men dɨbobonim bar moghɨra 22,300ɨn otogham. Me Purirpenimɨn ganamin ingangarir maba iti.
